item.title: So youâ€™re playing with Blog Torrent
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I started poking around with Blog Torrent today, in a mix of "jumping on the latest and greatest craze" and wanting to find other means of getting content that myself and my friends/family do out into the world. Here are my first two in action: Touch of Death #1 Preview (PDF format) Touch of Death #2 Preview (PDF format) A list of all the torrents I'll be keeping with be here.
